name: Ennis's Magnetic Field Trip
description:
Here's the prototype of our first mobile game featuring our mascot Ennis!

We are aware that adjustments need to be made to the game's difficulty and enemy behaviour, but please let us know what you think about the concept and of Ennis's design. We will also be updating the game art very soon.

The controls are very simple: rotate your magnet clockwise or anticlockwise to push the cockroaches away from Ennis.

Please give us your suggestions and feedback, and feel free to share screenshots of your high score. How long can you survive? [:

We are working on a 3D puzzle platformer that Ennis will also feature in

Like and Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EnnisPhysicsGame/
